# thunder_rule_set (Resource)

`thunder_rule_set`: Configure Security policy Rule Set

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_rule_set" "RuleSet" {

  name              = "test"
  session_statistic = "enable"
  user_tag          = "testing"
  sampling_enable {
    counters1 = "all"
  }

  rule_list {
    name         = "testin123"
    action       = "permit"
    idle_timeout = 4
    dscp_list {
      dscp_value = "default"
    }
    user_tag = "testing"
  }

}
```
